name: Cannon Fodder (itch) (Jacob Welch - Game Designer)
description: Cannon Fodder is a game about shooting cannons out of cannons. The cannons name is CanCan and he isn't very fond of fire so players must avoid it and reach the end goal of each level to win the game. This is a two-week prototype made for my group's Game Design 2 class and I think it turned out very well but am open to any feedback anyone might have.
